0:
# remap app name from label
.custom_app_name = .pod_labels."app.kubernetes.io/name" || .pod_labels.app || .pod_labels."k8s-app" || "unknown"
# remap pod name from event
.custom_pod_name = .pod_name || "unknown"
# drop remapped fields
del(.pod_labels)
1:

# remap pod name from event
.custom_pod_name = .pod_name || "unknown"
# drop remapped fields
del(.pod_labels)
